meta.title: Generic Allocator's Documentation Format
meta.description: Some Notes Regarding the Generic Allocator's Documentation Format

article.paragraph:
This documentation is a work in progress(WIP) and consists of a set of articles which are related to each other. It describes the objectives of this project in detail. This is followed by some planning and some historic documents. Theories, software and research which are useful to the project are aggregated at a different
project. /2017/05/16/aggregation-of-information-related-to-computer-science
Afterwards the architecture and implementation is discussed. In the end an evaluation of the results is provided.
The specification of the project's application programming interface(API) is integrated into this documentation and is not separated into different and isolated documents.
